Player History
Earned first career win on 6/15/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,280,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Los Angeles to Oakland on 5/11/1986 (Going to LAD: RF Cory Snyder. Going to OAK: P Steve Howe, P Tom Brennan)...
10/13/1986: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $3,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/6/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
10/6/1989: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $1,010,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had first career hit on 5/21/1990, off Bobby Thigpen (MON)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
3/4/1991: Signed a minor league contract extension with Cincinnati...
